Neglecting this can have detrimental effects on their development, cognitive abilities, and bonding with you as a parent.

Research has shown that regular reading with children from a young age promotes language development, enhances literacy skills, improves concentration, and fosters imagination and creativity. Additionally, shared reading experiences can strengthen the parent-child relationship, boost emotional intelligence, and instill a love for learning.

It is crucial to prioritize dedicating time each day to engage in activities like reading with your kids.
